description:
Super-intelligent mice have invaded the house!  And then, Keroro tries transforming Giroro into a cow as part of an invasion operation.  But Giroro being male, he turns into a {\i0}bull{\i1}... a terrifying minotaur-like creature, to be exact.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Flowers for Algernainon / Giroro, Oh! Ferocious Ox
ケロロ アルジャナイノンに花束を であります / ギロロ Oh! モウギュウ であります
